postExecute(address,bool,uint256,uint256.details: Executes a transaction and handles Zbyte-related operations.

params.executeResult_: A boolean indicating the success of the execution.
params.gasConsumedEth_: The amount of Ether consumed for gas during execution.
params.payer_: The address of the payer initiating the execution.
params.preChargeEth_: The amount of Ether charged before execution. This function can only be called by the `onlyForwarder` modifier.
params.reqValue_: The amount of Ether sent with the execution request.

GetRoyaltyFeeInZbyteFailed(bytes).notice: errorError(0x91acbad9) Error details for getRoyaltyFee failure.

NotAForwarder().notice: error (0x5ac85bab): Caller is not a forwarder

UnusualGasUsageForEnterprisePolicy(uint2.notice: Error(0x72b10f2e) Error unusal gas usage for enterprise policy updation.

PostExecFees(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Event(0x5ccdbb95) Address of the payer, Pre Exec charge, Post Exec Charge, Refund if neccessary

PreExecFees(address,bytes4,uint256,uint2.notice: eventsEvent(0x0f1db6a3) Address of the payer, enterprise hash, DPlat, Infra and Royalty Fee

getPayer(address,address,bytes4,uint256).notice: Determines the payer for a transaction.In the absence of an enteprise policy, if a dapp or user is registered with ent, ent will pay for the call, as long as it has balance

preExecute(address,address,bytes4,uint25.notice: Pre Execution (Finds the payer and charges in ZbyteVToken)
